item.title: Attach to specific Process shortcut in Visual Studio
item.description: It’s a very useful feature of Visual Studio that besides starting an application for debugging, we can attach the debugger to already running processes as well. This can be done with the Debug->Attach to Process… option, where we have to select the desired one from a list of all running processes. This method of attaching to a process is OK if you have to do it only once in a while, but if you have to debug applications this way regularly, it becomes time-consuming to search for the process in the list every time.
